Text: What exactly does '320 kbps/256 kbps' mean? Was it originally 320 just upconverted?

@Emo6277

It means VBR - variable bitrate ranging from 256 ~ 320 kbps!
But the files are in 320kbp/s cbr o3o

@Emo6277

Are you complaining abt superior quality then??
no, i prefer 320, but i was just wondering how you got it in 320, its not a physical cd release and all the online retailers that sell this digitally dont sell this in 320
